account.title: Smol Account
account.description: Setup your basic account information. Full documentation can be found at {setup_account_docs_url}

data_description.name: An identifier for this account (e.g. main)

reconfigure_account.title: Update Account Info
reconfigure_account.description: Update your basic account information. Full documentation can be found at {setup_account_docs_url}

error.server_error: Failed to connect to Smol servers. Please try again later

account_not_found.title: Account "{name}" not found
account_not_found.description: The integration failed to retrieve the information associated with your configured account. Please check your account exists and that your username and password are valid. Click "Learn More" to find out how to fix this.
